title: ECommerce System
description: A React-based E-commerce application that allows users to browse products, search by name, view product details, manage a shopping cart, and place orders.

title: SimpleZone
description: Developed part of the front-end components using React and managed backend operations with PostgreSQL and MongoDB databases.

title: Online Food Ordering System
description: A web-based food ordering system with front-end UI using HTML and CSS, and backend built with PHP and MySQL.

title: Library Management System
description: Built a library management system with a front-end UI and backend using PHP and MySQL.

title: Detecting Signs of Depression from Social Media Text
description: Developed a machine learning model to detect signs of depression using social media text data.

title: Bus Ticket Booking System
description: Created a desktop-based Java Swing application for bus ticket booking with a complete GUI and booking flow.

title: CPQ Project
description: Worked on product configuration and pricing automation using Infor CPQ.

title: Data Migration
description: Migrated data from Infor XA to Mulesoft using Infor ION API integration.

title: Customer Order Creation
description: Automated customer order and line item creation from CSV files via SystemLink using RPGLE.
